message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. I believe this price reflects its value and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand you're looking to make a deal, Bob. However, I have to consider my minimum price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1600000. This is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $1700000?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1700000. I can do $1750000, but that's as low as I can go. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how much longer I'll be willing to negotiate.
I appreciate your persistence, but I really need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $1500000?
